name: Dream Ception
description:
Dream Ception

Would you embark on a journey to find out who you are and why have you come here?

When you play REMEMBER THERE WILL BE CONSEQUENCES

YOU WILL NOT EXPECT ANYTHING CAUSE YOU CANT EXPECT

Have fun :D

a sequel will be coming soon!

any questions, feedbacks, suggestions pls let me know!

known issues: in the house level player moves towards x axis more so pls press D on the keyboard to overcome that(trying to fix the bug but the slippery bug is fixed)

(if browser laggy then pls download)
